children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnService查询SCDN服务状态。包括：服务开通时间，频次攻击保护等数据。
children.title: DescribeScdnService
children.name: DescribeScdnService

children.summary: 查询SCDN是否开通，是否欠费。
children.title: CheckScdnService
children.name: CheckScdnService

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnUserProtectInfo查询用户开通的服务信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnUserProtectInfo
children.name: DescribeScdnUserProtectInfo

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnUserQuota查询用户资源上限及已使用情况。
children.title: DescribeScdnUserQuota
children.name: DescribeScdnUserQuota

children.summary: 只有开通后，才能进行域名操作。
children.title: OpenScdnService
children.name: OpenScdnService

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnDomainDetail获取指定加速域名配置的基本信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnDomainDetail
children.name: DescribeScdnDomainDetail

children.summary: 查询用户名下所有的安全加速域名。支持域名模糊匹配过滤和域名状态过滤。
children.title: DescribeScdnUserDomains
children.name: DescribeScdnUserDomains

children.summary: 调用AddScdnDomain添加安全加速域名。
children.title: AddScdnDomain
children.name: AddScdnDomain

children.summary: 调用UpdateScdnDomain修改加速域名配置。
children.title: UpdateScdnDomain
children.name: UpdateScdnDomain

children.summary: 调用BatchDeleteScdnDomainConfigs批量删除域名配置。
children.title: BatchDeleteScdnDomainConfigs
children.name: BatchDeleteScdnDomainConfigs

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnDomainCertificateInfo获取指定加速域名证书信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnDomainCertificateInfo
children.name: DescribeScdnDomainCertificateInfo

children.summary: 检测用户是否完成Cname，支持多个域名。
children.title: DescribeScdnDomainCname
children.name: DescribeScdnDomainCname

children.summary: 调用BatchUpdateScdnDomain批量更新安全加速域名。
children.title: BatchUpdateScdnDomain
children.name: BatchUpdateScdnDomain

children.summary: 停用某个加速域名，将DomainStatus变更为offline。
children.title: StopScdnDomain
children.name: StopScdnDomain

children.summary: 调用DeleteScdnDomain删除已添加的加速域名。
children.title: DeleteScdnDomain
children.name: DeleteScdnDomain

children.summary: 启用状态为“停用”的加速域名，将DomainStatus变更为online。
children.title: StartScdnDomain
children.name: StartScdnDomain

children.summary: 调用BatchStartScdnDomain启用状态为“停用”的加速域名。
children.title: BatchStartScdnDomain
children.name: BatchStartScdnDomain

children.summary: 调用BatchStopScdnDomain停用加速域名。
children.title: BatchStopScdnDomain
children.name: BatchStopScdnDomain

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnDDoSInfo查询DDoS防护信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnDDoSInfo
children.name: DescribeScdnDDoSInfo

children.summary: 调用SetScdnDDoSInfo设置网络攻击弹性防护带宽。
children.title: SetScdnDDoSInfo
children.name: SetScdnDDoSInfo

children.summary: 可查询多个功能配置。
children.title: DescribeScdnDomainConfigs
children.name: DescribeScdnDomainConfigs

children.summary: 查询频次控制防护功能信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnCcInfo
children.name: DescribeScdnCcInfo

children.summary: 调用SetScdnCcInfo设置频次防护功能。
children.title: SetScdnCcInfo
children.name: SetScdnCcInfo

children.summary: 调用DeleteScdnSpecificConfig删除加速域名的配置。
children.title: DeleteScdnSpecificConfig
children.name: DeleteScdnSpecificConfig

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnCertificateList获取证书列表信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnCertificateList
children.name: DescribeScdnCertificateList

children.summary: 调用BatchSetScdnDomainConfigs批量配置域名。
children.title: BatchSetScdnDomainConfigs
children.name: BatchSetScdnDomainConfigs

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnCertificateDetail获取证书详细信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnCertificateDetail

children.summary: 调用SetScdnDomainBizInfo设置域名业务类型。
children.title: SetScdnDomainBizInfo

children.summary: 设置某域名下证书功能是否启用及修改证书信息。

children.title: DescribeScdnRefreshQuota
children.name: DescribeScdnRefreshQuota

children.summary: 刷新节点上的文件内容，刷新指定URL内容至Cache节点，支持URL批量刷新。
children.title: RefreshScdnObjectCaches
children.name: RefreshScdnObjectCaches

children.summary: 调用PreloadScdnObjectCaches将源站的内容主动预热到L2 Cache节点上，用户首次访问可直接命中缓存，缓解源站压力。

children.name: PreloadScdnObjectCaches

children.name: DescribeScdnCcQpsInfo

children.summary: 获取安全加速域名指定时间段之内的频次攻击URL信息。
children.title: DescribeScdnCcTopUrl

children.summary: 调用DescribeScdnDomainBpsData获取安全加速域名的网络带宽监控数据。

children.title: DescribeScdnDomainOriginBpsData

children.title: DescribeScdnDomainQpsData
children.name: DescribeScdnDomainQpsData
